\index{GeneticOptimizer (class in genetic\_optimizer)@\spxentry{GeneticOptimizer}\spxextra{class in genetic\_optimizer}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:genetic_optimizer.GeneticOptimizer}}\pysigline{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{genetic\_optimizer.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{GeneticOptimizer}}}~\begin{description}
\item[{GeneticOptimizer Abstract class, define the}] \leavevmode
basic functions of the rest of Genetic Optimizer classes
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
fit function: train using Genetic Algorithm

\item {} 
GA function

\end{itemize}

Operations needed durante Genetic Algorithms
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
fitness function: evaluating a chromosome

\item {} 
generate\_population

\item {} 
random\_selection

\item {} 
reproduce

\item {} 
mutate

\end{itemize}

\end{description}

\index{GeneticRegularizator (class in genetic\_optimizer)@\spxentry{GeneticRegularizator}\spxextra{class in genetic\_optimizer}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:genetic_optimizer.GeneticRegularizator}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{genetic\_optimizer.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{GeneticRegularizator}}}{\emph{model}, \emph{mutation\_prob=0.5}, \emph{mutation\_rate=None}, \emph{elite=2}, \emph{genetic\_train=True}, \emph{stop\_condition=None}, \emph{epochs=-1}, \emph{fitness\_function=\textless{}function GeneticRegularizator.\textless{}lambda\textgreater{}\textgreater{}}, \emph{mutables=1}, \emph{original\_mutation\_prob=0.5}, \emph{pop\_dist='uniform'}, \emph{mutation\_dist=\textless{}built-in method uniform of mtrand.RandomState object\textgreater{}}, \emph{callbacks={[}{]}}, \emph{iterations=None}}{}
GeneticRegularizator class
\begin{quote}

Using during a backpropagation training, will regularize the whole training if
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
If callback is provided and then, the training process is interrupted, or

\item {} 
When the training process with backpropagation is finished

\end{itemize}
\end{quote}
\index{GA() (genetic\_optimizer.GeneticRegularizator method)@\spxentry{GA()}\spxextra{genetic\_optimizer.GeneticRegularizator method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:genetic_optimizer.GeneticRegularizator.GA}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{GA}}}{\emph{population}, \emph{iterations}, \emph{x}, \emph{y}, \emph{x\_test}, \emph{y\_test}}{}~\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{population}} \textendash{} initial population. List of numpy vectors

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{iterations}} \textendash{} integer. Number of generations

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{x}} \textendash{} train dataset (numpy array)

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{y}} \textendash{} labels for train dataset (numpy vector)

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{x\_test}} \textendash{} test dataset (numpy array)

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{y\_test}} \textendash{} labels for test dataset (numpy vector)

\end{itemize}

\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
tuple (best individual found as numpy vector, max value found, history of bests)

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}
